title: NakedPack uses edible, soluble food packaging to give you a complete meal
excerpt: https://vimeo.com/721917759?embedded=true&source=vimeo_logo&owner=125548125 One of the most wasteful and mostly non-biodegradable things we have lying around is food packaging. But if you buy your food or ingredients in "traditional" supermarkets or from the usual brands, you know that sustainable packaging is not their utmost priority.
